# Reference

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`profile_influxdb`](#profile_influxdb): Install and configure InfluxDB service
* [`profile_influxdb::config`](#profile_influxdbconfig): Manage the InfluxDB configuration and files.
* [`profile_influxdb::firewall`](#profile_influxdbfirewall): Open InfluxDB port in the firewall
* [`profile_influxdb::service`](#profile_influxdbservice): Install InfluxDB package and manage service

## Classes

### <a name="profile_influxdb"></a>`profile_influxdb`

Install and configure InfluxDB service

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_influxdb
```

### <a name="profile_influxdbconfig"></a>`profile_influxdb::config`

Manage the InfluxDB configuration and files.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_influxdb::config
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_influxdb::config` class:

* [`data_dir`](#data_dir)
* [`data_index_version`](#data_index_version)
* [`data_query_log_enabled`](#data_query_log_enabled)
* [`data_series_id_set_cache_size`](#data_series_id_set_cache_size)
* [`data_wal_dir`](#data_wal_dir)
* [`group`](#group)
* [`http_auth_enabled`](#http_auth_enabled)
* [`http_bind_address`](#http_bind_address)
* [`http_bind_port`](#http_bind_port)
* [`http_https_enabled`](#http_https_enabled)
* [`http_https_certificate`](#http_https_certificate)
* [`http_https_private_key`](#http_https_private_key)
* [`http_log_enabled`](#http_log_enabled)
* [`http_max_body_size`](#http_max_body_size)
* [`host`](#host)
* [`logging_level`](#logging_level)
* [`meta_dir`](#meta_dir)
* [`monitor_store_interval`](#monitor_store_interval)
* [`reporting_disabled`](#reporting_disabled)
* [`ssl_ca_content`](#ssl_ca_content)
* [`ssl_cert_content`](#ssl_cert_content)
* [`ssl_key_content`](#ssl_key_content)
* [`tls_ciphers`](#tls_ciphers)
* [`tls_max_version`](#tls_max_version)
* [`tls_min_version`](#tls_min_version)
* [`user`](#user)

##### <a name="data_dir"></a>`data_dir`

Data type: `String`

Directory where the TSM storage engine stores TSM files.

##### <a name="data_index_version"></a>`data_index_version`

Data type: `String`

Type of shard index to use for new shards.

##### <a name="data_query_log_enabled"></a>`data_query_log_enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether queries should be logged before execution.

##### <a name="data_series_id_set_cache_size"></a>`data_series_id_set_cache_size`

Data type: `Integer`

Size of internal cache used by TSI index to store calculated series results.

##### <a name="data_wal_dir"></a>`data_wal_dir`

Data type: `String`

Directory where the TSM storage engine stores WAL files.

##### <a name="group"></a>`group`

Data type: `String`

Group name for permissions of data directories.

##### <a name="http_auth_enabled"></a>`http_auth_enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether user authentication is enabled over HTTP/HTTPS.

##### <a name="http_bind_address"></a>`http_bind_address`

Data type: `String`

Bind address used by the HTTP service.

##### <a name="http_bind_port"></a>`http_bind_port`

Data type: `Integer`

Bind port used by the HTTP service.

##### <a name="http_https_enabled"></a>`http_https_enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether HTTPS is enabled.

##### <a name="http_https_certificate"></a>`http_https_certificate`

Data type: `String`

SSL certificate file to use when HTTPS is enabled.

##### <a name="http_https_private_key"></a>`http_https_private_key`

Data type: `String`

SSL private key file to use when HTTPS is enabled.

##### <a name="http_log_enabled"></a>`http_log_enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether HTTP request logging is enabled.

##### <a name="http_max_body_size"></a>`http_max_body_size`

Data type: `Integer`

Maximum size of a client request body, in bytes. Setting to 0 disables the limit.

##### <a name="host"></a>`host`

Data type: `String`

Hostname of service. Defaults to host's FQDN. Parameter not currently used anywhere.

##### <a name="logging_level"></a>`logging_level`

Data type: `String`

Level of logs emitted. The available levels are error, warn, info, and debug.

##### <a name="meta_dir"></a>`meta_dir`

Data type: `String`

Directory where the metadata/raft database is stored.

##### <a name="monitor_store_interval"></a>`monitor_store_interval`

Data type: `String`

Interval at which to record statistics.

##### <a name="reporting_disabled"></a>`reporting_disabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to disable reporting of usage data to usage.influxdata.com.

##### <a name="ssl_ca_content"></a>`ssl_ca_content`

Data type: `String`

Content of the SSL CA certificate(s) issued by the CA which signed the certificate.

##### <a name="ssl_cert_content"></a>`ssl_cert_content`

Data type: `String`

Content of the SSL certificate to be used by the influxdb service.

##### <a name="ssl_key_content"></a>`ssl_key_content`

Data type: `String`

Content of the SSL private key used in the CSR for the certificate.

##### <a name="tls_ciphers"></a>`tls_ciphers`

Data type: `Array[String]`

Available set of cipher suites.

##### <a name="tls_max_version"></a>`tls_max_version`

Data type: `String`

Maximum version of the tls protocol that will be negotiated.

##### <a name="tls_min_version"></a>`tls_min_version`

Data type: `String`

Minimum version of the tls protocol that will be negotiated.

##### <a name="user"></a>`user`

Data type: `String`

User name for permissions of data directories.

### <a name="profile_influxdbfirewall"></a>`profile_influxdb::firewall`

Open InfluxDB port in the firewall

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_influxdb::firewall
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_influxdb::firewall` class:

* [`allowed_subnets`](#allowed_subnets)

##### <a name="allowed_subnets"></a>`allowed_subnets`

Data type: `Hash[String,String]`

Subnets allowed access via InfluxDB ports

### <a name="profile_influxdbservice"></a>`profile_influxdb::service`

Install InfluxDB package and manage service

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include profile_influxdb::service
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `profile_influxdb::service` class:

* [`manage_service`](#manage_service)
* [`required_packages`](#required_packages)
* [`service_name`](#service_name)

##### <a name="manage_service"></a>`manage_service`

Data type: `Boolean`

Flag of whether to manage InfluxDB service

##### <a name="required_packages"></a>`required_packages`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of package names to be installed (OS specific).

##### <a name="service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String`

Name of InfluxDB service
